abstract.text: Live core view component, providing view container for live streaming push and playback, supporting multi-person co-guest, PK and other features.

inlineContent.text: Live core view component, providing view container for live streaming push and playback.
provides view container for live streaming push and playback, supporting multi-person co-guest, PK and other features.
Through this component, video rendering and interaction in live rooms can be implemented.

to set the live room ID first.
